LanguageData.PsychicDronerShipPart.label: ship part (psychic droner)
LanguageData.PsychicDronerShipPart.description: An ancient ship part, torn off of a craft of unknown origin. It might be thousands of years old.\n\nThis one contains a psychic disturbance device. Using incomprehensible archotechnologies, it generates a psychic signal that drives people and animals mad within a wide radius around itself.
LanguageData.DefoliatorShipPart.label: ship part (defoliator)
LanguageData.DefoliatorShipPart.description: An ancient ship part, torn off of a craft of unknown origin. It might be thousands of years old.\n\nThis one contains a device which annihilates plant life near itself without directly affecting flesh creatures. These kinds of weapons are sometimes scattered across farmlands or forests during land, to remove the enemy's food supply and hiding places without permanently ruining the territory. They're usually associated with orbital-drop mechanoid armies.
LanguageData.ShipMechChunk.label: ship mechanics chunk
LanguageData.ShipMechChunk.description: A chunk of a spacecraft. Can be deconstructed to yield useful mechanisms, wire and electronic components.
LanguageData.CrashedShipWreck.label: crashed ship wreck
LanguageData.ShipWreck.label: ship wreck
LanguageData.ShipChunk.label: Ship chunk
LanguageData.ShipChunk.description: A chunk of a spacecraft. Can be deconstructed to yield useful metals and components and mechanisms.
LanguageData.Totem.label: totem
LanguageData.Totem.description: A person-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.Totem_Blueprint.label: totem (blueprint)
LanguageData.Totem_Frame.label: totem (building)
LanguageData.Totem_Frame.description: A person-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.

LanguageData.Cairn.description: A person-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.Cairn_Blueprint.label: cairn (blueprint)
LanguageData.Cairn_Frame.label: cairn (building)
LanguageData.Cairn_Frame.description: A person-sized piece of material sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.HeadPike.label: headpike
LanguageData.HeadPike.description: A head stuck on a pike, ooo scary.
LanguageData.HeadPike_Blueprint.label: headpike (blueprint)
LanguageData.HeadPike_Frame.label: headpike (building)
LanguageData.HeadPike_Frame.description: A head stuck on a pike, ooo scary.
LanguageData.AncientPowerPole.label: ancient power pole
LanguageData.AncientPowerPole.description: Part of a long gone power network. No longer functional.
LanguageData.ToxicSign.label: toxic sign
LanguageData.ToxicSign.description: Road sign warning of toxic danger from long ago.
LanguageData.ToxicBarrel.label: toxic barrel
LanguageData.ToxicBarrel.description: Barrel of toxic waste from long ago still doing damage to its environment.
LanguageData.APCWreck.label: destroyed apc
LanguageData.APCWreck.description: Wreck of an ancient armoured military vehicle. No longer functional.
